data.name: Unexplored OST
data.detailed_description:
The Original Soundtrack of Unexplored

About the Soundtrack


Especially for this album, composer Matthijs Dierckx of TwoComposers (http://twocomposers.com) created an new version of the now famous main theme and produced several mix downs of the ingame adaptive tracks. The album includes all the ingame music as well as all the music composed for the game’s several trailers and even some previously unreleased music.

The album was mastered using analog equipment, giving it a slight ‘vinyl’ sound. Mastering was done by Arno Landsbergen.

How to play?


Within Steam:
LIBRARY>MUSIC>UNEXPLORED OST

Out of Steam:
Copy or import the mp3-files to your favourite player. You'll find the folder containing the OST within the game folder, but you can also easily find it by starting Steam and then choose LIBRARY>MUSIC>UNEXPLORED OST>VIEW IN SYSTEM.

Track list


1. Main Theme - Album Version
2. Game Over and Over and Over...
3. I am the Greatest
4. The Way Out
5. Dragon Fight
6. Ingame Silas
7. Ingame Feija
8. Ingame Gilian
9. Ingame Mette
10. Ingame Little Carl
11. Ingame Ramon
12. Launch It Already (trailer)
13. The Way Out Reprise (trailer)
14. The Final Update (bonus track)
15. Valse Du Lancement (bonus track)

Questions? Mail the composer at matthijs@twocomposers.com
